sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Restricts the tables users can choose from for their source ID.</description>
        <name>SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables = Class.create();
SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	process: function() {
		// For now limit the user to select scoped applications. When update sets are supported we will
		// add the sys_update table to this array.
		var sourceIdTables = ['sys_app'];
		return sourceIdTables;
	},
    type: 'SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-05-20 16:59:44</sys_created_on>

        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SysAppPayloadGeneratorSourceIDTables</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Templates" source="com.snc.apps_templates">703481cb6da620100acb70b3534330d9</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1c8580970f3010108c9c5019c4767e10</sys_update_name>

</record_update>
